short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily manage and access your brand assets with KitPal - your personal brand kit organizer.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KitPal is designed to streamline your brand management process. With KitPal, you can:

✅ Store and organize multiple brand kits
✅ Save and quickly access brand colors in HEX, RGB, or HSL formats
✅ Upload and manage brand logos for easy retrieval
✅ Copy colors and logos to your clipboard with a single click
✅ Use keyboard shortcuts for rapid access to your brand assets

Features:

✅ Support for up to 5 brand kits
✅ Store up to 5 colors and 2 logos per brand
✅ Customizable color format (HEX, RGB, HSL)
✅ Keyboard shortcuts for quick access
